Segment.name: CHB
Segment.comment: To define elements associated with a charge to unemployment insurance tax account

Field.name: LocationIdentifier
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

Field.name: ReasonStoppedWorkCode
Field.comment: Code identifying reason claimant stopped working

Field.name: ClaimTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the basis and type of a legal claim

Field.name: ClaimStatusCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the status of an entire claim as assigned by the payor, claim review organization or repricing organization

Field.name: EntityIdentifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

Field.name: CreditDebitFlagCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether amount is a credit or debit

Field.name: IndustryCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeIndicator
Field.comment: Code which indicates an allowance or charge for the service specified

SyntaxNote.name: P0102
SyntaxNote.comment: If either CHB01 or CHB02 is present, then the other is required.
